title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Gains 3.2% as All Assets Trade Higher
summary: Sui (SUI) gained 8.2% and Aave (AAVE) gained 5.9%, leading index higher from Wednesday.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2800.48, up 3.2% (+86.71) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+8.2%) and AAVE (+5.9%).

Laggards: ICP (+0.7%) and FIL (+1.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index gained 3.2% with all 20 assets trading higher, indicating broad market strength and positive momentum.
